an6.4:4.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe …
an6.4:4.4: Saddhābalena, vīriyabalena, satibalena, samādhibalena, paññābalena, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an6.4:4.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti … pe …
